name: daisyui
description: Styled and unstyled UI Components based on Tailwind CSS
author: Pouya Saadeghi

scripts.postcss: postcss base.css -o dist/base.css && postcss styled.css -o dist/styled.css
scripts.min: MINIFY=true postcss base.css -o dist/base.min.css && MINIFY=true postcss styled.css -o dist/styled.min.css
scripts.json: prejss-cli dist/base.css --format commonjs && prejss-cli dist/styled.css --format commonjs
scripts.dev: npm run postcss && npm run json
scripts.build: npm run postcss && npm run json && npm run min
